title: Won 5/10 Provisionals got placed in Bronze 5
body:
I have no idea how people who win 3/10 provisionals still get placed into silver, meanwhile I win 5 and am in the depths of hell aka BRONZE 5/WOOD LEAGUE/ S***TOWN. My match history speaks for itself. My provisionals did not warrant a bronze 5 placement, this is so discouraging and upsetting that I am not sure I can find the will to ever play this game again. If anyone has any idea why the hell this happened please comment, don't be rude.

thank you

replies.body:
Hey JedidiahWest,

It looks like you finished the season last year in bronze. As explained in our [Ranked Season](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/get-ready-2015-ranked-season) article, your placement is heavily based off of where you finished last season.
care to explain how I go 7/10 and end up in silver V? I was silver III in S4

Hey Thryale,

Under the seeding section in the [Ranked season](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/get-ready-2015-ranked-season) article you can see that we performed a soft reset that may result in players being placed lower than the last season. After playing more games, you will make it to where you are supposed to be.

Digital Ram,

We hate the formula for Season 5 (and 4) reset.

Sincerely,

Ex-League Players

just unisntalled the game too. I was raging too much cause of the trolls noob feeders and because of that 5.2 patch bugging the champ movement (our champ go to the opposite from where we click (some time we click like in mid, on t he ground not on a mob, and the champ stop moving mid way wtf)).

I call BS on this riot. I played with many silver players this season and to be honest. They suck, and I don't find it far at all to say. We put you where we think you belong in your post about new Ranking season. This game isn't about luck, but player and there chooses.. If you says {{champion:7}}  can play a support roll. You trolling and you know it cause I had that. If you say {{champion:40}} can play a Tank roll for your team. You are again Trolling cause I had that. If you say {{champion:42}} is a good Mid or {{champion:19}} is a good support. AGAIN YOUR TROLLING cause I seen that. There is no such thing as lucky and unlucky. It players trolling or just not wanting to put time in looking up how to do other rolls and champs needed for it. Maybe if you Lower the IP Prices on a FEW MORE CHAMPS. Player could be able to play better champs.
I know this was 3 years ago but I cant help but say that corki is a good mid now, maybe the guy wasn't trolling and he could see the future lmao

> [{quoted}](name=Digital Ram,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rNaHAxic,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-28T22:49:46.978+0000)
>
> Hey JedidiahWest,
> 
> It looks like you finished the season last year in bronze. As explained in our [Ranked Season](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/get-ready-2015-ranked-season) article, your placement is heavily based off of where you finished last season.

Hello please help me, I finished in silver 5 last season went 4-6 in placements and still got b-5, like how?

This actually has me curious. I've been playing since Season 1. Skipped ranked because I didn't find it fun.

Season 2 I managed to scrape enough ELO for Gold to get the Janna skin.

Season 3 I started to play ranked but I think I got somewhere in Silver.

Season 4 I never even played my 10 placement matches.

Season 5 I went 4-6 and still mananged Silver 4.

I was fully expecting Bronze so color me a little surprised when I saw that. How does the system take into account for a season not even played?

last season bronze or not he still won 5 out of 10 and in unranked games its sooooo full of trolls, 5 win is a fucking lot seriously. If he had to be bronze then bronze he should go but not in division 5 wtf. 5 win is supposed to be minimum bronze 3...

And btw digital ram, is the new system based on real season or pre season counted ? Cause on my main I managed to get out of elo hell during the pre season and be in gold V, this season i won 6 unranked and i been classed wtf silver 3. You dont imagine how much I raged the other day man fucking bs elo hell. There is no way to get out. We have 1 troll/dcer/afker/rager every 3 fucking game, its just unplayable.

This is simply awful, I am sorry but 5 wins does absolutely not warrant a bronze 5 placement even if I was BRONZE 3 LAST YEAR AFTER I WON 2 OF MY PROVISIONALS. Whats the point of having a provisional qualifier if your placement last year determines where you shall be next year. The more I think of this the more upset I get because of all the time I have put into this game, just for me to finish dead last.
Thank you for at least answering me

Dude I feel ya. I won 6 out of 10 and got placed in Bronze 5 too. I am a bit sick of this because I was working my a$$ off in normals in the pre-season to get better. And that is how I am rewarded. Nope. Just nope.
During those games I went from playing with and against Bronze 5 people to playing with and against people from Bronze 3-1. Then to losses, one mor last victory (where I and someone else carried HARD because the rest fed 8-14 kills) and BAM... Bronze 5.

i won 7/10 matches. i support carried hard most matches if not all wins. i got bronze 5. rito why? im not saying i did the best, but if you look at my last 10 ranked matches, i think i did alright. at least good enough for bronze 4 lol
Got 7-3 was silver 1  placed in bronze.....Is Digital Ram still  working for riot?

I am so extremely done with this game, last season I ended up in Silver 1, now I am really unlucky to get placed in 3 games with afk's. The other games were shitt as well. Now I'm bronze 2 and I just played my first game ever in bronze, the whole team already rages at the lock in screen before the game even started. im just really dissapointed in Rito and their ways.... I put so much money, time and love into this game and we don't even get some random free skin, champ or anything like that. Pathetic. And then we get this ranked system...

The funny thing is. i was silver 1 last season then lost due to trolls fell down into silver 3. But just finished my placement matches and won 5 lost 5 and got bronze 2 lmao this game does really count on luck i mean the games i lost was due to afk or feeders.... wtf was i supposed to do? 1v5 a decent team. to me the system is wack. Ill just play another game which ill be happy with and not rage about feeders or afkers. honestly league devs aint bothered about the community, the devs are milking money why would they care?.
I am still mad that i got placed in Bronze 3 after reaching silver 5 last season.  I went 8-2 in my placement matches.

Was that 5 wins in a row? Or 5 wins scattered throughout placements? Because having your wins be *consecutive* will actually place you higher than if it was one win, one loss, one more win, etc...

Also, if you were in Bronze 5 last season, having a win, then a loss, then a win, etc. in placements could keep you there. That's my thought on it anyway.
I was bronze 3 and I had won 3 matches in a row and the other 2 were scattered
Everyone in here sounds like they don't know what 500+ ranked games per season is. Grind boys. Grind hard.

Riot failed to inform everyone that the first and foremost match counts the most. It determines how high or low you get placed. The rest of your matches just helps, with the first being the determining decision. Although it is pretty disgusting that you win five and get placed at the lowest possible tier regardless. =\

Even if i got bronze 4 id be pissed sure, but I wouldn't be like how I am now knowing I'm amongst the worst of the worst. I just don't have the will and i am in awe that a video game can make me feel like this. I guess its time for me to get a new hobby.
